Title: Prediction of plain needs old telephone service (POTS) using ANFIS-GA
Source title: International Journal of Scientific and Technology Research
Affiliations: Computer Science Department, BINUS Graduate Program-Master of Computer Science, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Setiawan, A., Computer Science Department, BINUS Graduate Program-Master of Computer Science, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Girsang, A.S., Computer Science Department, BINUS Graduate Program-Master of Computer Science, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Abstract: One of the important in making decision in company is the prediction. One of the big communication company in Indonesia is PT T. One of problem in PT T is expected to address issues of service needs plain old telephone service (POTS) on the division of government service. For these reasons, the necessary system pots accurate prediction of service as a reference in determining the right policy. The data used are time series data for 5 years of service users. Adaptive Neuro Fuzzy Inference System (ANFIS) is conducted to build the model and Genetic Algorithm is built for improve the weight of parameter model. It shows that combination ANFIS and GA can improve the accuracy of prediction. © IJSTR 2019.
Author Keywords: ANFIS; Particle Swarm Optimization; Plain Old Telephone Service; Prediction
Funding Text 1: Here are the results of the overall MPS segment data in the 2012 period listed on table 5 Based on the figure 3 and figure 4 we can compile the method that has been implemented. Then it will be seen. Better MAPE comparisons. The MAPE value on ANFIS generates 1,494496908 And on MAPE ANFIS-GA produces 1,34150781 difference MAPE ANFIS and ANFIS-GA-0,152989097.
